import React from 'react' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function AddUser() { let navigate = useNavigate() const [user,setUser] = useState({ name:"", username:"", email:"" }) const {name,username,email} = user const onInputChange=(e) =>{ setUser({...user,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const onSubmit = async (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); await axios.post("http://localhost:8080/user",user) navigate("/"); } return (
